references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper outlines the reinforcement learning approach that serves as the foundation and inspiration for the method used in the reported work.
This paper introduces the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, a key component upon which Group Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO) is built, making it a core component of the methodology.

references.paper_title: Mvbench: A comprehensive multi-modal video understanding benchmark
references.reason: This paper describes a crucial benchmark used in the experiments to evaluate the performance of the proposed model, making it essential for validation.
